intro: Notylia simplex, commonly known as the smooth notylia, is a flowering plant native to parts of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, greenish-white flowers that bloom in clusters. Notylia simplex typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors or along stream banks. Its botanical features make it a unique and often overlooked member of the orchid family.
